data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Corner awarded to New York.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Orlando.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Orlando.
Fotis Bazakos awards Orlando a goal kick.
In the minute 8, In Orlando New York attack through Brian White. The finish is off target, however.
Orlando have a goal kick.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 9, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Throw-in for Orlando close to the penalty box.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for New York at Exploria Stadium.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Orlando.
Mandela Egbo (New York) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 15, Free kick for New York in their own half.
Mauricio Pereyra (Orlando) has received a first yellow card.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
New York have a dangerous throw-in.
New York are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 22, Fotis Bazakos awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Orlando take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Daryl Dike.
Great play from Kyle Smith to set up the goal.
In the minute 26, In Orlando Orlando drive forward through Chris Mueller. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
New York needs to be cautious. Orlando have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 28, New York have a goal kick.
Fotis Bazakos signals a Orlando throw-in in New York's half.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of New York.
In the minute 31, New York are caught offside.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, Fotis Bazakos signals a throw-in for New York, close to Orlando's area.
New York drives forward and Brian White gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Orlando.
In the minute 40, Throw-in high up the field for New York in Orlando.
Orlando to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of New York.
In the minute 42, New York advance rapidly upfield but Fotis Bazakos blows for offside.
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Exploria Stadium.
The second-half is now underway.
Oscar Pareja (Orlando) is making a first substitution, with Benji Michel replacing Mauricio Pereyra.
In the minute 49, Free kick in a good position for New York!
New York have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Can New York capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
In the minute 50, Goal! Orlando extend their lead to 2-0 through Junior Urso.
Chris Mueller with an assist there.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 54, Florian Valot strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Exploria Stadium.
Corner awarded to New York.
Goal kick for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 58, The away team have replaced Mandela Egbo with Jared Stroud. This is the first substitution made today by Bradley Carnell.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Free kick New York.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Orlando close to the penalty box.
In the minute 63, Fotis Bazakos signals a Orlando throw-in in New York's half.
New York have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
In the minute 67, Orlando drive forward but Daryl Dike is judged offside.
Fotis Bazakos awards Orlando a goal kick.
Daryl Dike of Orlando gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 70, Fotis Bazakos awards New York a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Orlando in Orlando.
Throw-in for New York at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 72, Orlando to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marc Rzatkowski is replacing Kaku for the away team.
In the minute 73, The away team replace Daniel Royer with Omir Fernandez.
Throw-in New York.
Goal kick for New York at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to New York.
New York are in shooting range from this free kick.
Oscar Pareja is making the team's second substitution at Exploria Stadium with Antonio Carlos replacing Kamal Miller.
In the minute 79, Joey Dezart is on a sub for Daryl Dike for Orlando.
New York's Brian White breaks free at Exploria Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 80, Orlando have a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Brian White with Samuel Tetteh. This is the fifth substitution made today by Bradley Carnell.
Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 83, Can New York capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
New York make their fourth substitution with Dru Yearwood replacing Cristian Casseres Jr.
Fotis Bazakos awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for New York close to the penalty box.
Alex De John is replacing Chris Mueller for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 89, It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
Attention is being given to Orlandoâ€™s Junior Urso and play has been suspended briefly.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of New York.
Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
Antonio Carlos for the home team is judged to be offside.
The match has come to a close in Orlando. The final score is 3-1.
The home team has substituted Junior Urso with David Loera. Oscar Pareja is thus making his fifth change.
Great finish from Antonio Carlos to give Orlando a 3-1 lead.
